articles.description: EASTENDERS co-stars Max Bowden and Shona McGarty have split – six months after they started dating. The actor, who plays Ben Mitchell in the BBC1 soap, and stunning Shona decided it wasn’…
articles.content:
EASTENDERS co-stars Max Bowden and Shona McGarty have split six months after they started dating.
